title: [Large-scale] Online Project-Based Course on Fundamental Ophthalmic Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of Basic Medical Terminology and Biological Concepts
context.additional_context: Interactive online learning environment using digital devices, structured as 15-hour content.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the anatomical structure and function of the eye using 3D simulation tools.
Learners can analyze and explain the pathogenic mechanisms of major ophthalmic diseases through storytelling videos.
Learners can demonstrate clinical reasoning skills by diagnosing virtual patient cases and producing project-based outcomes.
Learners can design and execute ophthalmic experimental protocols using interactive digital tools.
Learners can write research reports in the format of an ophthalmology journal through team-based PBL (Problem-Based Learning) assignments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
